source.name: Final Critical Habitat for the Huachuca water umbel (Lilaeopsis schaffneriana var. recurva)
source.description: Abstract: To provide the user with a general idea of areas where final critical habitat for Huachuca water umbel (Lilaeopsis schaffneriana var. recurva) occur based on the description provided in the Federal Register. The geographic extent includes Cochise and Santa Cruz Counties, Arizona.     Purpose: Critical habitat are areas considered essential for the conservation of a listed species. These areas provide notice to the public and land managers the importance of these areas to the conservation of this species. Special protections and/or restrictions are possible in areas where federal funding, permits, licenses, authorizations, or actions occur or are required.
